## isFunction() function

检查值value是否是函数

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function isFunction<T = Function>(value: unknown): value is T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | unknown | 要检查的值 |

**Returns:**

value is T

如果value为funciton类型,那么返回true,否则返回false
